channel.title: Product Hunt on AICube.FUN
channel.description: Recent content in Product Hunt on AICube.FUN

item.title: A conversation between two indie hackers on building products, lifestyle design, and luck
item.description: Background This is a summary of a conversation between two indie hackers, Jim and Dimitris, who met through Twitter despite living in the same city in Greece. Jim started out building a VC-funded startup called Visualize, which developed AI for heatmap predictions on websites.
